issue.title: can't spawn a model with the same name as a previously-deleted one

content.raw:
I can't reproduce the issue on Gazebo 9, try for example:

1. Open Gazebo
1. Insert a sphere from the toolbar, it is called `unit_sphere`
1. Insert a second sphere, it's called `unit_sphere_0`
1. Delete `unit_sphere`
1. Insert a new sphere, it will be called `unit_sphere`
content.html:
I can't reproduce the issue on Gazebo 9, try for example:

  1. Open Gazebo
  2. Insert a sphere from the toolbar, it is called unit_sphere
  3. Insert a second sphere, it's called unit_sphere_0
  4. Delete unit_sphere
  5. Insert a new sphere, it will be called unit_sphere
